tags.description:
From here you may browse our library of API resources, organized hierarchically by domain, or major functional area, logical subgroup, API resource, and all available operations against that resource. For more information about the concepts and technology behind our API, refer to the [Getting started](C:636f581c-50a8-41a7-af43-e5057f9c20bd) documentation.

Our platform provides a powerful application programming interface and documentation to help you develop secure, scalable, and high-performance applications that leverage the full breadth of capabilities offered by our backend services.

The Workforce Management suite's API is founded on a pragmatic implementation of the [representational state transfer](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Representational_State_Transfer) architectural style and allows access to your organization's workforce management data using common HTTP methods and the [JSON](http://www.json.org) interchange format.
tags.name: API

tags.description: This resource allows you to retrieve and manipulate billing department and work unit maps.
tags.name: Billing Department and Work Unit Maps

tags.description: This resource allows you to retrieve and manipulate charge masters for Healthcare Analytics.
tags.name: Charge Masters

tags.description: Workforce Analytics for Healthcare enables authorized users to measure and manage daily and pay period productivity by performing analysis based on data from a facilityâ€™s billing and payroll systems, its supplemental labor records, and the workforce data stored in Dimensions. HCA provides dynamic and interactive reporting capabilities that apply productivity targets to this data, as well as mechanisms for defining limits for key performance indicators (KPI), detecting acceptable and unacceptable variances of these limits, and generating requests for responses from responsible individuals.
tags.name: Healthcare Analytics

tags.description: This resource allows you to transform raw payroll data into enriched payroll data.
tags.name: Payroll Data Enrichment

tags.description: This resource provides a set of operations that allow you to retrieve and manipulate payroll department to work unit maps.
tags.name: Payroll Department to Work Unit Maps

tags.description: This resource provides a set of operations that allow you to retrieve and manipulate payroll employment status to Analytics labor type maps.
tags.name: Payroll Employment Status to Labor Type Maps

tags.description: This resource provides a set of operations that allow you to retrieve and manipulate payroll department maps.
tags.name: Payroll Job Maps

tags.description: This resource allows you to retrieve and manipulate raw volume for Healthcare Analytics.
tags.name: Raw Volume

tags.description: This resource allows you to retrieve and manipulate volume copy maps for Healthcare Analytics.
tags.name: Volume Copy Maps

tags.description: This resource allows you to retrieve and manipulate volume copy override maps.
tags.name: Volume Copy Override Maps

tags.description: This resource allows you to retrieve volume process status. This is normally used by Healthcare to import daily transactional volume that processes and computes metric-level data. The Reporting system also makes use of volume process data. Volume process data consists of allocated or weighted volume.
tags.name: Volume Process Status

tags.description: This resource allows you to recalculate volume data.
tags.name: Volume Recalculation

tags.description: This resource allows you to retrieve and manipulate work unit Hyperfind Profiles.
tags.name: Work Unit Hyperfind Profiles

tags.description: This resource allows you to retrieve and manipulate work unit Hyperfinds.
tags.name: Work Unit Hyperfinds

tags.description: This resource allows you to retrieve location details about Work Units, Healthcare Targets, and Symbolic Time Periods.
tags.name: Work Unit Locations

tags.description:
This resource allows you to retrieve and manipulate work units.

Work units are user-defined entities that can exist at any level of an organization, from a group of similar jobs in a department to divisions across enterprises. Examples of work units include:


  • Pharmacy
  • Cardiac Care
  • Radiology X-Ray
  • Radiology MRI
tags.name: Work Units

get.description: This operation returns all work units and includes pagination support with the optional parameters start, index, and count.

parameters.description: The pagination index, which represents the particular page of work units to return in the response.
parameters.name: index

parameters.description: The pagination count, which represents the number of work units to return per page. This parameter is optional and has no upper limit.
parameters.name: count

post.description: This operation retrieves the details of the given Work Units, definitions of the given Healthcare Targets, pay period date spans and days of operation of the given symbolic time periods or date range.
post.summary: Retrieve details for the given Work Units, Healthcare Targets and Symbolic Time Periods.

post.description: This operation creates or updates one or more work units.

parameters.description: The Create or Update Work Units request payload.
parameters.name: body

post.summary: Creates or updates one or more work units.

get.description:
This operation returns all of the maps between billing departments and work units. Pagination support is included for large responses.


The associated Access Control Point is as follows:

  • ACP Key: HEALTHCARE_ANALYTICS
  • API Access Controlled By: Edit
  • Default Value: Disallowed
  • Location in the Dimensions UI: Manager - System Configuration > KPI > Builder - Setup Configuration > Healthcare Analytics
get.operationId: Retrieve All Billing Department and Work Unit Maps

parameters.description: The Delete Switch enables soft delete.
parameters.name: deleteSwitch

400.description: Billing Department and Work Unit mapping does not exists.

get.summary: Returns all of the maps between billing departments and work units.
tags: Billing Department and Work Unit Maps

post.description:
This operation creates or updates billing department and work unit maps. The Delete Switch can be updated based on the unique combination of billing department and work unit.


The associated Access Control Point is as follows:

  • ACP Key: HEALTHCARE_ANALYTICS
  • API Access Controlled By: Edit
  • Default Value: Disallowed
  • Location in the Dimensions UI: Manager - System Configuration > KPI > Builder - Setup Configuration > Healthcare Analytics
post.operationId: Create or Update Billing Department and Work Unit Maps

parameters.description: The Create or Update Billing Department and Work Unit Mappings request payload.
parameters.name: body

200.description: Successfully created list of Billing Department and Work Unit mapping

post.summary: Creates or updates billing department and work unit maps.
tags: Billing Department and Work Unit Maps

get.description: This operation returns all charge masters. The response may be paginated using index and count. The count query parameter has no upper limit.

post.description: This operation creates a new or updates an existing charge master. Charge masters are identified based on the unique combination of a Billing Department and a Procedure Code or Volume label.

parameters.description: The Create or Update Charge Masters request payload.
parameters.name: body

200.description: Successfully persisted list of Charge Master.

post.description: This operation returns one or more volume labels by object references. The response may be paginated using index and count.

parameters.description: The Retrieve Volume Labels request payload.
parameters.name: body

400.description: The specified volume labels do not exist.

post.summary: Returns one or more volume labels.

post.description: This operation creates or updates raw volume.

parameters.description: The Create or Update Raw Volume request payload.
parameters.name: body

200.description: Successfully persisted list of Raw Volume data.

post.description:
This operation recalculates volume by date range.


The associated Access Control Point is HEALTHCARE_ANALYTICS.

200.description: Successfully triggered the historical recalculation of volume data based on date range.

get.description: This operation returns all volume copy maps. The response may be paginated using index and count. The count query parameter has no upper limit.

parameters.name: body

200.description: Successfully persisted list of Volume Department Copy data.

parameters.description: The execution key associated with a volume process.

get.description:
This operation returns all work unit Hyperfind Profiles. This operation supports pagination.


The associated Access Control Point is HEALTHCARE_ANALYTICS.

parameters.description: The pagination index of the Retrieve All Work Unit Hyperfind Profiles request. This parameter is optional and has no upper limit.
parameters.name: index

parameters.description: The pagination count of the Retrieve All Work Unit Hyperfind Profiles request. This parameter is optional and has no upper limit.
parameters.name: count

get.summary: Returns all work unit Hyperfind Profiles.

get.description:
This operation returns all work unit Hyperfinds. This operation supports pagination.


The associated Access Control Point is HEALTHCARE_ANALYTICS.

parameters.description: The pagination index of the Retrieve All Work Unit Hyperfinds request.
parameters.name: index

parameters.description: The pagination count of the Retrieve All Work Unit Hyperfinds request. This query paramter has no upper limit.
parameters.name: count

post.description:
This operation executes a work unit Hyperfind and returns work units constrained by a date range.


The associated Access Control Point is HEALTHCARE_ANALYTICS.

parameters.description: The Execute Work Unit Hyperfind request payload.
parameters.name: body
